long_description: Designed for playing around water, the women's Patagonia Barely Baggies Shorts have a lower rise and shorter inseam than the original Baggies, but are made of the same great quick-drying fabric. Nylon fabric features a Durable Water Repellent finish that beads up moisture. Covered elastic waistband has an inner drawcord so you can adjust the fit. Side-entry pockets have mesh for quick drainage. Patagonia Barely Baggies Shorts for women have a 2.5 in. inseam.
short_description: Designed for playing around water, the women's Patagonia Barely Baggies Shorts have a lower rise and shorter inseam than the original Baggies, but are made of the same great quick-drying fabric.
